section.title: Autoloader
section.para: Along with the Zend's autoloader, Majisti adds up to the autoloading stack with its implementation of an autoloader PHP5.3 namespaced class. A class located under /Path/To/Class would be instanciable without using require_once with the namespace syntax, which in this case would be \Path\To\Class provided it is retrievable from the include_path.
